docs.snippet: Two players from Argentina face off at the U.S. Open.
docs.abstract: Two players from Argentina face off at the U.S. Open.

headline.main: Del Potro Defeats Junqueira in Straight Sets

docs.snippet: Two players from Argentina face off at the U.S. Open.
docs.lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro and Diego Junqueira traveled more than 5,000 miles from their native Argentina only to meet in the second round of the U.S. Open on Friday. When their encounter ended after barely two hours, del Potro was the almost-easy victor, 6-2, 6-1, 7-5.
docs.abstract: Two players from Argentina face off at the U.S. Open.

headline.main: Del Potro Defeats Junqueira in Straight Sets

docs.snippet: Several hundred Haitians demonstrated in Port-Salut on Monday in support of an 18-year-old man who said he was sexually assaulted by peacekeepers from Uruguay on a United Nations base.
